name: retrieve_code_context
description: Retrieves relevant code snippets and documentation from the indexed codebase. Use this tool to find implementation details, function definitions, and related code before answering questions about the codebase. IMPORTANT: Only answer based on the context returned by this tool. If no relevant context is found, say 'I don't have information about that in the codebase.'

project_id.description: The project identifier to search within (e.g., 'crm-backend', 'randevu-app', 'mobil-api'). Ask the user which project they want to search if not clear.

query.description: Natural language query describing what code or information you're looking for. Be specific and include relevant technical terms.

top_k.description: Number of results to return. Use 5 for focused queries, 10 for broader searches. Maximum is 20.

filters.description: Optional filters to narrow down search results
